lead_paragraph: Her Perfection Is Only Part of It In David Atkins's black comedy ''Novocaine,'' Laura Dern plays a character named Jean Noble -- a name that could probably be applied to many of the upright, optimistic, all-American characters that Ms. Dern has interpreted in the course of her career. But this Jean Noble has a secret. She's not just the dedicated assistant to the suburban dentist played by Steve Martin, but something considerably more -- something it will cost you a ticket to find out.
abstract: At the Movies column; Laura Dern discusses role in Novocaine; photo; Mexican filmmaker Guillermo del Toro recalls influence of Mexican horror films of his youth; Patrik-Ian Polk discusses sleeper hit Punks (M)
